channel.title: Authors on Sohanuzzaman
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Sohanuzzaman

item.description:
Final-year Computer Science and Technology student at Wuhan Institute of Technology with a cyber-defense focus. I mix penetration-testing labs, Hack The Box practice, and malware research with production-ready Flutter apps and secure Firebase integrations.

Currently wrapping up my undergraduate thesis on ensemble learning for Windows malware detection while freelancing as a Flutter developer. Always open to entry-level cybersecurity roles, collaborative freelance projects, and research partnerships.
